title: Add About/Onboarding section and DMC Technologies attribution

requirements.text: Add a public (no sign-in required) About/Onboarding section that explains what the DM Networks project is, how users can interact (sign in with Internet Identity, create/edit profile, post messages in the live chat), and clearly states that the project is managed by DMC Technologies with a clickable link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr.

quotes: user have to understand projetc, how interacts works and that is managed by dmc technologies (https://www.dmc-technologies.fr)

acceptanceCriteria: When signed out, users can access an About/Onboarding view/section from the main UI (e.g., header or footer) without being blocked by AuthGate.
The About/Onboarding content is written in English and explains: what the app is, how to sign in, that profiles are used for display names, and that chat messages are visible to authenticated users.

The About/Onboarding content includes a visible attribution line stating the project is managed by DMC Technologies and includes a working external link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr (opens in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer").

requirements.text: Update the global layout to surface DMC Technologies attribution consistently (e.g., in the footer) while preserving existing branding links already present in the app.

quotes: that is managed by dmc technologies (https://www.dmc-technologies.fr)

acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays an English attribution mentioning “Managed by DMC Technologies” and links to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr.
Existing footer content (e.g., the caffeine.ai link) remains present unless it conflicts visually; any changes still keep the footer coherent and readable on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Do not edit immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Use English for all user-facing text added or modified.
nonGoals: Do not add third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
Do not introduce WebSockets or real-time infrastructure; keep existing polling-based chat behavior.
Do not change backend data schema or add new backend endpoints unless strictly required for the About/Onboarding content (expected: not required).
